caption.p: Relative expression (in fold change) of ethylene receptor genes ERS1, ERS2, ETR2, ETR3 and ETR4 in the apical and basal spikelets of the panicle of high sterile (SR-159) over low sterile (SR-157) rice genotypes and in the basal over apical spikelets of SR-157 and SR-159 analysed by Real Time PCR (qRT-PCR). The data are means of three replicates and vertical bars represent ± SD values (n = 3).
